short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple scanner for bluetooth devices nearby.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AngularJS based bluetooth scanner chrome app. 
With this app you can scan for nearby bluetooth devices with chrome.

It's still in an early stage, but will be updated continuously. 
If you encouter any issues or errors, please give me feedback so that I can investigate and fix the bug.

After installation you'll find the app where all chrome apps can be founnd:

ChromeOS: Click the apps icon in your taskbar
Non ChromeOS: Go to chrome://apps or click on your apps button in the browser.

Tested platforms are:
----------------------
- Chrome OS
- Chrome on OSX
- Chrome on Windows

Unsupported platforms:

- Chrome on Linux (at least for me)

Changelog:

Version 0.3.1:
  - Minor wording fixes
  - Error on unsupported OS
  - Fixed device fetching

Version 0.3:
  - Better styles
  - Fixed vendor output
  - Better angular code
